message.content:
cs.MA, cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a multiagent learning algorithm that is guaranteed to converge in self-play and learn a best response against stationary opponents in all repeated (finite) games. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Multiagent Systems (cs.MA), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Game Theory (cs.GT), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Systems and Control (cs.SY). However, given that the paper focuses specifically on multiagent learning algorithms, cs.MA is the most likely sub-category. The use of game theory concepts and the analysis of convergence properties also make cs.GT a likely sub-category. The use of machine learning techniques and the focus on learning optimal strategies suggest cs.AI and cs.LG as possible sub-categories. Finally, the use of control theory concepts and the analysis of system properties suggest cs.SY as a possible sub-category.
